name: Cune
description:
Overview:

Another chilled block game to play when you have some spare time

A proper challenge to 100% all achievements

A few secrets maybe hidden as well

Gameplay:

Move Left and Right to avoid obstacles

Use Jump Pads to clear big gaps in the track

Game Modes:

Zones & Levels: Complete a fixed length level by making it to crystal at the end!

Endless: Get as far as you can and keep pushing to beat your highscore!

Multiplayer (Beta):

Play with friends using local multiplayer (It's a bit scuffed)

Port Forwarding is required for global games, instructions in game

Achievements:

Complete CUNE by obtaining all achievements

Honestly it's actually a challenge
